item.title: The Best Time to Post on Hacker News
item.description: I’m starting a new blog and I have the ambition of attracting high quality traffic very quickly. Marketers recommend scheduling your posts to reach the largest audience possible, so what really are the best hours for Hacker News, a community of night owls?

item.title: Run a Static Site On Google Cloud Run
item.description: Google Cloud Run is a newly announced Google Cloud service. The idea is simple: itâ€™s Docker on serverless. Google Cloud Run is similar to Google Cloud Function: you write code without worrying about infrastructure.

item.title: Just Send a Notification
item.description: How Slack decides whether to send a notification or not?
